response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. I understand its significance to you as well, and I believe it would greatly benefit your endeavors. After careful consideration, I am extending an offer to sell this product to you at a price of $900,000. This is a special concession considering the product's intrinsic worth to both of us. I am confident that this offer will allow us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Please let me know if you require any further information or have any questions regarding the product or the offer. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 900000}
